views.markdown: The most native, powerful and safe cheat for PUBG MOBILE for iOS that was designed for iPhones and iPads.

#### ESP

Osiris provides the most eye-comfort visual ESP with full options and customization.

#### Aimbot

The most powerful and legit aimbot with smoothness, prediction and automatic recoil compensation system. The safest silent aimbot with other different aimbot features.

#### Optional features

Strong and useful optional features like enabling the maximum frame rate and graphics settings on every iOS device. With providing a new visual features ever like Mod skin with suits and weapons for Elimination Broadcast, Hit Effects and Loot Crates.

#### Safety

The most safest cheat every exists that bypasses all detections on every jailbreak device.
- Added support to Global, VNG, KR and TW versions of 3.5.0
- Added support to Global, VNG, KR and TW versions of 3.4.0

- Added support to Global, VNG, KR and TW versions of 3.3.0
- Stability improvements

- Added support to Global, VNG, and TW versions of 3.2.0
- Unlocked 120 fps for all devices
- Removed mod skins due to security issues.

- Added support to Global, VNG, KR and TW versions of 3.1.0
- Added new themed gameplay pickup items and vehicles.
- Added new skins to the mod skin.
- Added customization to alpha of colors (transparency)
- Fixed death crate doesn't appear for certain weapons and only displays elimination effect.
- Fixed random crash issues of mod skins.
- Fixed injection failure to TW version of the game.
- Fixed warnings cannot be disabled bug
- Improvements to mod skin, weapons now change in realtime.
- Improvements to Aimbot Visibility check, now works if weapon can see the enemy.
- Improvements to Silent Aimbot direction accuracy.

- Added support to VNG, KR and TW.
- Improvements to cheat stability.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Initial release with free-bugs version.
- Bypasses general security detections.
